provisions.content:
23. A society shall not grant credit facilities-
   (a) to any person if the credit facilities granted exceed in the
        aggregate 20% of the society’s capital base but where any
        portion of suoh credit facilities is unsecured that portion shall

       40% of the society’s capital base but where any portion of
       such credit facilities is unsecured that portion shall not exceed
       20% of the society’s capital base.

provisions.content:
25. A society shall not directly or indirectly acquire or hold in the

provisions.content:
26.41) A society shall not beneficially hold in fee simple for any

provisions.title: Section 28
provisions.content:
28. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary. where a transaction
is entered into by a society, whether before or after the 27th day of
March, 1995, in contravention of any provision of this Part, nothing
in this Part shall prevent the society from enforcing the transaction
against any person or party thereto.

provisions.title: Section 29
provisions.content:
29. Any society which contravenes any regulation in this Part shall
be guilty of an offence.

provisions.title: Section 30
provisions.content:
30. Any miety which, before the 27th day of March, 1995, has
entered into any transaction inwpatible with the provisions of this
Part, shall within one month of the 27th day of March, 1995, submit
to the Bank a statement giving particulars of all such transactions as
are still in operation at that date, shall within another month submit a
programme for the rectification of each such transaction for considera-
tion by the Bank, and shall comply with such programme as is finally
determined by the Bank after due discussion with the society.

provisions.content:
31. Every society shall maintain in the form of a deposi,t with the
Bank a cash reserve not less on the average than such percentage of

Bank may from time to time determine and notify to each society.
